channel.title: mySQL on Ye Zheng's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in mySQL on Ye Zheng's Blog

item.title: MySQL
item.description: MySQL Shell Guide Connecting to and Disconnecting from the Server shell> mysql -h host -u user -p mysql> QUIT User Account Management Adding User Accounts shell> mysql --user=root --password mysql shell> mysql --u root -p mysql mysql> CREATE USER 'custom'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'password'; mysql> GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON *.* TO 'finley'@'localhost' -> WITH GRANT OPTION; mysql> CREATE USER 'custom'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY 'password'; mysql> GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON *.* TO 'finley'@'%' -> WITH GRANT OPTION; mysql> CREATE USER 'admin'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'password'; mysql> GRANT RELOAD,PROCESS ON *.
